name: Saxman v. United States Fire Insurance Company, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Saxman v. United States Fire Insurance

judges: Before Frazer, O. J., Simpson, Kephart, Schapper, Maxey, Drew and Linn, JJ.
parties: Saxman v. United States Fire Insurance Company, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Pee Curiam,
The judgment in this case is affirmed on the opinion of the learned trial judge of the court below.
opinions.author: Pee Curiam,

attorneys: Robert D. Dalzell, of Dalzell, Dalzell, McFall & Pringle, for appellant.
Parry E. MeWhinney, with him Nicholas TJnlcovic, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Saxman v. United States Fire Insurance Company, Appellant.
Argued October 10, 1934.
Before Frazer, O. J., Simpson, Kephart, Schapper, Maxey, Drew and Linn, JJ.
November 26, 1934:
Robert D. Dalzell, of Dalzell, Dalzell, McFall & Pringle, for appellant.
Parry E. MeWhinney, with him Nicholas TJnlcovic, for appellee.
